question: ASSALAMU-ALAIKUM Can you tell me what to pray so that I can receive a virtuous marriage partner as I am not receiving any good proposals.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
The recitation of 500 times Salaat and Salaam upon our beloved Nabi
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) everyday is very effective for your purpose,
Insha Allah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
